name: Along Came a Sparrow
description:
Along Came a Sparrow is a visual novel created by a team of 4 for the 2021 Global Game Jam. It takes about 20-30 minutes to play and is a reimagining of "The Tongue-Cut Sparrow".

It's currently a fully kinetic VN, but we're planning to patch in some branching joke/alternate endings in the near future.

Credits:

Sound and Music: ZeroJanitor
Character Art and Backgrounds: AReallyFrog
Character Art, Lettering, and Editing: Katherine Valdez
Writing and Programming: I am nobody
